pakuchi.name: Pakuchi
pakuchi.backstory: Pakuchi Paku, born in Japan, is a tsundere martial artist who is proud, competitive, loving, caring, protective, determined, hard-working, honest, loyal, kind, friendly, and cheerful. Despite her cute appearance and small stature, she is a force to be reckoned with. She has white hair, red pupils, and a loli-like frame. She competes in tournaments worldwide and volunteers at an orphanage.
